item.description:
Hello everyone,

 

The Greater Boston Food bank is seeking help loading turkeys to be supplied for thanksgiving celebrations in various shelters and underprivileged groups throughout the area. Volunteer should be able to lift about 50 lbs and bend without problems. If you are feeling strong and want to help some people have a special thanksgiving, please do stop by the GBFB. A large parking area available outside.

 

Nagina.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Turkey Loading for the Greater Boston Foodbank
